name: Bottled Sea Grapes
description:
Made for the dredge the depths game jam

Link to the jam here.

Bottled Sea Grapes is a short rpg maker horror game, that explores the following themes: CW: Depictions of gore, and mental illness

Play as Neyza, a jellyfish fellow, who after exploring a colorful and varied array of different oceans and seas, comes back home to something odd. A giant dilapidated temple, that they have never seen before, and that calls them deeper and deeper into it.
